name: Overlord: Dark Legend
overview: A new Overlord action RPG, exclusively for Wii, complete with all-new minion control mechanics, the game is a standalone prequel to the original Overlord. The Young Overlord must protect his father’s castle and lands from his even more evil twin siblings in a tongue-in-cheek fantasy world of grim/twisted fairytales • Minion Motion Control: A new way to command your minions using your Wii Remote and Nunchuk. • Drop-in co-op play lets a second player cast spells and add boost to minions • New spells to boost your minion’s powers of destruction. New abilities for each minion type: Dig, Glow, Gas and Freeze
